transcription.text: Heidi Klum is known for her dedication to halloween costumes, having previously dressed as the ogre version of Fiona from Shrek, Jessica Rabbit and even an alien science experiment gone wrong. In 2022 she outdid herself, dressing in full-body prosthetics to party as an earthworm, while husband Tom Kaulitz dressed as a fisherman. The committed costume set social media abuzz as the internet considered that Klum finally had a concrete answer to the age-old question: would you still love me if I was a worm? More so, Klum's elaborate costumes also pay homage to the movie-making magic of prosthetics and make-up.
